titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate from Thursday, February 4, 1993, or Friday, February 5, 1993, until Tuesday, February 16, 1993, and a conditional adjournment of the House from Thursday, February 4, 1993, or Friday, February 5, 1993, until Tuesday, February 16, 1993.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Provides for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from February 4 or 5, 1993, until February 16, 1993, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives from February 4 or 5, 1993, until February 16, 1993.
